title: Space-Thing
description: A space simulator I'm working on. A lot of maths and a bit of jazz, and by jazz I mean TypeScript and more maths.

title: WarpSpeed
description: I wrote a small NPM package for easily getting the star wars warp speed effect on the web, using HTML5 canvas and TypeScript.

title: EEE Logo
description: As well as web devlopment, I sometimes like to tinker with photoshop and used this to design Sheffield University's new (as of 2019) & current EEE society logo.
